title: Drive Activity (appsactivity)
description: Provides a historical view of activity.

appsactivity_activities_list.title: Returns a list of activities visible to the current logged in user. Visible activities are determined by the visiblity settings of the object that was acted on, e.g. Drive files a user can see. An activity is a record of past events. Multiple events may be merged if they are similar. A request is scoped to activities from a given Google service using the source parameter.
